channel.title: Non experienced team -> Recruiting!
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][u]Introduction[/u][/size] This thread is looking for "non-experienced programmers". This project is mainly to get a group of programmers to experienced level. And since im not experienced and the road there might be tough alone, I decided to make this a project for multiple people to learn and create.
I'm at the time 14 years old. (15 in January) I'm from Sweden and my dream job Is probably some kind of game developer. So starting early to learn a little about coding will probably help me a bit. That is mainly why I want to start this project, also getting to know other people and work with them.
[size=14pt][u]About the server[/u][/size] The revision we'll be working on will either be a 614-666 or a 718. We'll have to decide what revision/server we want if a team actually is created. The server will mostly be for PvM and skilling, with a bit of Pking. Ofcourse we'll discuss this matter if team is created.
[size=14pt][u]Applications[/u][/size] Please fill in this application if intrested in joining the team. Remember this is for non-experienced. [code]For how long have you been coding? - How much time do you have for this project? - Do you have any RS/RSPS knowledge? - What is your age? - What is your time zone? - [/code][/center]

item.title: Non experienced team -> Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Elixium Elixium
item.description:
@Elixium wrote:

For how long have you been coding? - 4 years
How much time do you have for this project? - as much as needed
Do you have any RS/RSPS knowledge? - tons, i made Project one (put it in the search bar) and i have made multiple rsps’s
What is your age? - 16
What is your time zone? - eastern pacific

Read full topic

item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:535008”]Please don’t start your programming career in private servers.[/quote]rep++…
I wish somebody would’ve stap me.

item.title: Non experienced team -> Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Please don’t start your programming career in private servers.

As much as normally don’t agree with Atomic… his above post is actually 100% true and is 100% perfect advice…for any starting programmer.

Read full topic

[center][size=14pt]Introduction[/size]
This thread is looking for “non-experienced programmers”. This project is mainly to get a group of programmers to experienced level.
And since im not experienced and the road there might be tough alone, I decided to make this a project for multiple people to learn and create.

I’m at the time 14 years old. (15 in January) I’m from Sweden and my dream job Is probably some kind of game developer.
So starting early to learn a little about coding will probably help me a bit. That is mainly why I want to start this project, also getting to know other people and work with them.

[size=14pt]About the server[/size]
The revision we’ll be working on will either be a 614-666 or a 718.
We’ll have to decide what revision/server we want if a team actually is created. The server will mostly be for PvM and skilling, with a bit of Pking. Ofcourse we’ll discuss this matter if team is created.

[size=14pt]Applications[/size]

For how long have you been coding? - How much time do you have for this project? - Do you have any RS/RSPS knowledge? - What is your age? - What is your time zone? - [/center]
